about.description:
Software package and libraries for sequential and parallel
graph partitioning, static mapping and clustering, sequential
mesh and hypergraph partitioning, and sequential and parallel
sparse matrix block ordering.
about.summary: SCOTCH: Static Mapping, Graph, Mesh and Hypergraph Partitioning, and Parallel and Sequential Sparse Matrix Ordering Package

name: ptscotch
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.16.0
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: ptscotch
    version: 6.0.6
source:
    fn: scotch-6.0.6.tar.gz
    patches:
        - patch1.diff
    sha256: 686f0cad88d033fe71c8b781735ff742b73a1d82a65b8b1586526d69729ac4cf
    url: https://gforge.inria.fr/frs/download.php/latestfile/298/scotch_6.0.6.tar.gz
build:
    number: 1000
    script: ${RECIPE_DIR}/build.sh
    string: hfb59629_1000
requirements:
    build:
        - binutils_impl_linux-64 2.31.1 h6176602_1
        - binutils_linux-64 2.31.1 h6176602_3
        - gcc_impl_linux-64 7.3.0 habb00fd_1
        - gcc_linux-64 7.3.0 h553295d_3
        - gfortran_impl_linux-64 7.3.0 hdf63c60_1
        - gfortran_linux-64 7.3.0 h553295d_3
        - libgcc-ng 7.3.0 hdf63c60_0
        - libgfortran-ng 7.3.0 hdf63c60_0
        - libstdcxx-ng 7.3.0 hdf63c60_0
    host:
        - flex 2.6.0 0
        - libgcc-ng 7.3.0 hdf63c60_0
        - libgfortran-ng 7.3.0 hdf63c60_0
        - libiconv 1.15 h14c3975_1003
        - libstdcxx-ng 7.3.0 hdf63c60_0
        - m4 1.4.18 h14c3975_1001
        - mpi 1.0 mpich
        - mpich 3.2.1 h1c2f66e_1005
        - scotch
        - zlib 1.2.11 h14c3975_1003
    run:
        - libgcc-ng >=7.3.0
        - libgfortran-ng >=7,<8.0a0
        - mpich >=3.2,<3.3.0a0
        - scotch
        - zlib >=1.2.11,<1.3.0a0
        - zlib >=1.2.11,<1.3.0a0
test:
    commands:
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libptscotch.a"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libptscotcherr.a"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libptscotcherrexit.a"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libptscotchparmetis.a"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/lib/libptesmumps.a"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/include/ptscotch.h"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/include/ptscotchf.h"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/include/esmumps.h"
        - test -f "${PREFIX}/include/scotch/parmetis.h"
        - test ! -f "${PREFIX}/include/parmetis.h"
    requires:
        - gxx_linux-64
about:
    description: 'Software package and libraries for sequential and parallel

        graph partitioning, static mapping and clustering, sequential

        mesh and hypergraph partitioning, and sequential and parallel

        sparse matrix block ordering.

        '
    doc_url: http://gforge.inria.fr/docman/?group_id=248&dirid=326
    home: https://www.labri.fr/perso/pelegrin/scotch/
    license: CeCILL-C
    license_file: doc/CeCILL-C_V1-en.txt
    summary: 'SCOTCH: Static Mapping, Graph, Mesh and Hypergraph Partitioning, and
        Parallel and Sequential Sparse Matrix Ordering Package'
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - basnijholt
        - dalcinl
        - minrk
